review: I really like the concept of this product, the ease of set-up/use and the options available. I bought refurbished and have had no problems related to that as far as I can tell, but there have been some speed and quality issues. Like other reviews I read, it can be slow, but typically once you get it going it is fine. The most annoying thing is the HD cutting in and out frequently. I have only used it for netfilx and amazon prime so far, so this may not be the case with other streaming channels. It also seems to happen more with TV shows than movies for some reason. I think it is time for an upgrade to my router and internet service, so I need to do that and see if maybe that is part of the slow streaming. For me, this works far better than chromecast, which wasn't set up for amazon, took a while to load and required the use of your computer or smart phone while viewing, thus using twice the technology and ultimately, electricity in your home. Overall, I'm satisfied, but I need to figure out this HD thing to be completely happy. The product did ship very quickly, and all components were included.

review: This is my first streaming stick so I don't have much in the way of experience but I can say that it works exactly as advertised. I found set up to be simple, it took less than 10 minutes. Streaming is very reliable with no buffering or excessive load times. The remote isn't the greatest but I use my phone or my iPad usually so its not a problem. Overall, I couldn't be more pleased with it. I would definitely recommend the Roku. Great product.
